00010     construct from LCObject
00011   ******************************************************/
00012   SimpleValueVector::SimpleValueVector( EVENT::LCObject* obj ) 
00013   {
00014     EVENT::LCGenericObject* gObj = dynamic_cast< EVENT::LCGenericObject* >( obj );
00015 
00016     if ( gObj == NULL )
00017       throw std::invalid_argument( "SimpleValueVector: this LCObject is not LCGenericObject" );
00018 
00019     if ( gObj->getNInt() != gObj->getNFloat()/2+2 || gObj->getNFloat()%2 != 0 )
00020       throw std::invalid_argument( "SimpleValueVector: suspicious number of elements in this LCGenericObject" );
00021 
00022     for ( int i = 0; i < gObj->getNInt(); ++i )
00023       setIntVal( i, gObj->getIntVal( i ) );
00024 
00025     for ( int j = 0; j < gObj->getNFloat(); ++j )
00026       setFloatVal( j, gObj->getFloatVal( j ) );
00027   }
00028

00030   /**************************************************
00031     construct from HcalTileIndex
00032   ************************************************/
00033   SimpleValueVector::SimpleValueVector( const int id,
00034                                         const unsigned int nMemo,
00035                                         const std::vector<float> val,
00036                                         const std::vector<float> err,
00037                                         const std::vector<int> stat )
00038   {
00039     setCellID( id );
00040     setSize(nMemo);
00041 
00042     for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < nMemo; ++i )
00043       {
00044         setValue ( i, val.at(i)  );
00045         setError ( i, err.at(i)  );
00046         setStatus( i, stat.at(i) );
00047       }
00048 
00049   }
